DryadDataFile.dcterms:description: Total heat shock protein 70kDa (Hsp70) expression (i.e. constitutive and inducible isoforms are not differentiated) measured from Pisaster ochraceus tube feet and Mytilus californianus gill tissues. Tissues were sampled after individuals had been kept at one of six seawater temperature treatments (10, 13, 18, 21, 24, and 27ËšC) for 4d.
